title: Beauty tips for girls who love makeup
text: Many women complain of degrading skin health due to wearing makeup over the years. Quality products when teamed with a thoughtful skincare routine is a must in order to keep skin troubles at bay, and enjoy a well-sculpted look all day, every day. Here’s your 101 guide to have your cake and eat it too!It’s not enough to abide by the thumb rule ofbefore hitting the sack, you should also ensure that you’re doing it right. While it may seem that slight traces of leftover kohl or mascara are harmless, it can be damaging to the skin in the long run. Indulge in a two-step, thorough clean up, especially on days you wear heavy makeup. The skin near the eyes is the thinnest and most delicate, tug roughly and it will stretch over time, leading to fine lines. Therefore, be very gentle while working your way around that area. Above all, understand the need of your skin—oily, sensitive, and dry—and choose a product that aligns well.
description: Tips to take care of your skin with makeup remover, double cleansing, J Beauty, K Beauty, exfoliation, face mask, sleep and a cleansing detox.
